p: Phylogenetic trees were constructed using 17 plastid genomes downloaded from NCBI. We used the MAFFT software (Katoh and Standley 2013) to compare the plastid sequence with the default parameters. Phylogenetic analysis was conducted using the MEGA X (Li etÂ al. 2019) program with a total of 1000 bootstrap repeats. The results showed that G. sinensis and G. japonica ( Figure 1) are sister species.
